General.Name: Jiyuan Packaging Holdings Ltd
General.Description: Jiyuan Packaging Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of metal packaging containers in China. It offers aluminum and tin cans, as well as aluminum covers for food and drink industries. The company also provides tin cans, paper bowls, bottles, and plastic color-printing services. Jiyuan Packaging Holdings Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: Monaco Towers, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, KY1-1003
